metadata.title: About Us - SoloBoard
metadata.description: Learn about SoloBoard's mission to help solopreneurs manage multiple SaaS products efficiently. Built by founders, for founders.

hero.title: Built for the Army of One
hero.description: SoloBoard was born out of a simple frustration: Managing 10 SaaS products shouldn't feel like a chore.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: As a serial entrepreneur, I found myself wasting hours every week manually checking different admin panels. I realized that as my portfolio grew, my focus vanished. I didn't need more complex analytics; I needed a Pulse Monitor.
story.paragraph2: SoloBoard is our answer to the chaos. Built on top of robust technologies like Neon and ShipAny, we provide independent founders with the clarity they need to scale. We aren't just a dashboard; we are your digital command center, helping you spend less time monitoring and more time building.

items.title: Founder-First Design
items.description: Every feature is designed with the solopreneur's workflow in mind. No bloat, no complexity—just what you need.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: We build in public. Follow our journey on Twitter/X and see how we're constantly improving based on real user feedback.

items.title: Security by Default
items.description: Your data security isn't an afterthought—it's our foundation. AES-256 encryption and read-only access ensure your business stays safe.

cta.title: Join the Journey
cta.description: Follow our build-in-public journey and be part of the community shaping SoloBoard's future.
